name: EYE FOR AN EYE EYE EYE
name_original: EYE FOR AN EYE EYE EYE
description:
"It's not reyeal" - our entry for Brackey's 2022.1 Game Jam

This can't be happening, or can it? Try this shooter game where you have to fight your way out of a neyeghtmarish situation - and aim your hits where it really hurts! 

All you need is a mouse: hold left click to charge your shot and aim, release to shoot!

"If you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss will gaze into you" - Nietzsche
